name: Chaotic Dreams
description: ♦ Chaotic Dreams ♦ May 2013; self-published A collection of my personal artworks + two short comics between 1995 to 2013. A4 / 24 pages (including cover) / full colour / professionally printed ● All books will be signed ▸ book preview * Recommended reader's age: 12 years and older Alternatively, the more affordable "chaotic version" offers the same contents, with a bit of randomness when viewing. Selectable from the drop-down list. ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ ♦ 混沌之夢 ♦ 2013年5月; 個人誌 全彩畫集 + 兩篇彩色漫畫小短篇，收錄了1995至2013年間的個人作品。 A4版 / 24頁（含封面）/ 全彩輸出 ● 每本書都有作者親筆簽名 ▸ 內頁預覽 * 建議閱覽年齡：12歲以上 較為實惠的"混沌版"為同樣的內容，但不同的閱讀體驗。可在下拉選單作選擇。

name: étude
description: ♦ étude ♦ Nov 2011; self-published My second art book since "puppetbear's re-mix" in 2004. It's a collection of personal artworks between 2002 to 2007. A4 / 24 pages (including cover) / full colour / professionally printed ● All books will be signed ▸ book preview * Recommended reader's age: 12 years and older ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ ♦ 練習曲 ♦ 2011年11月; 個人誌 自2004年的"有熊式 混英集"之後第二本個人畫集，收錄了2002至2007年間的24張彩稿作品。 A4版 / 24頁（含封面）/ 全彩輸出 ● 每本書都有作者親筆簽名 ▸ 內頁預覽 * 建議閱覽年齡：12歲以上

name: puppetbear's re-mix
description: ♦ puppetbear's re-mix ♦ Jan 2004; self-published My first art book of the new millennium. It's a small collection of personal artworks between 2000 to 2004, including a coloured version of comics "A's Egg". A4 / 24 pages / full colour / English mixed with Chinese / professionally printed ● All books will be signed ▸ book preview * Recommended reader's age: 15 years and older Copies of "puppetbear's re-mix" were sold in the ICA (Institute of Contemporary Arts) Bookshop and Gosh! Comics in London. ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ ♦ 有熊式 混英集 ♦ 2004年1月；個人誌 千禧年首本個人畫集，收錄一篇11頁極短篇漫畫"A之卵"（彩色版）以及14張彩稿。 A4版 / 24頁 / 全彩輸出 / 中文參英文 ● 每本書都有作者親筆簽名 ▸ 內頁預覽 * 建議閱覽年齡：15歲以上 本畫集曾於倫敦當代藝術中心以及Gosh! Comics漫畫書店販售。
